properties.areaDesc: Northern Clearwater Mountains; Southern Clearwater Mountains
properties.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued January 9 at 3:33AM MST until January 11 at 5:00PM MST by NWS Missoula MT
properties.description:
* WHAT...For the Winter Weather Advisory, snow. Additional snow
accumulations of 1 to 3 inches. For the Winter Storm Watch,
heavy snow possible. Total snow accumulations of 10 to 17
inches possible.

* WHERE...Elk River, Highway 11 Pierce to Headquarters, Pierce,
Dixie, Elk City, and Highway 12 Lowell to Lolo Pass.

* WHEN...For the Winter Weather Advisory, until 8 AM PST this
morning. For the Winter Storm Watch, from Friday morning
through Saturday afternoon.

* IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible.
properties.instruction:
Slow down and use caution while traveling.

Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.

The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can
be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

NWSheadline: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 AM PST THIS MORNING... ...WINTER STORM WATCH IN EFFECT FROM FRIDAY MORNING THROUGH SATURDAY AFTERNOON
